scheme_name: AGR 4 (Farm Mechanization) Scheme For SC Farmers
description: The AGR 4 Scheme in Gujarat provides financial assistance to Scheduled Caste farmers for purchasing farm machinery to enhance productivity.
key_features: Subsidies for tractors, harvesters, and other equipment
Up to 50% subsidy on machinery cost

steps: Apply through agriculture department or portal
Submit caste certificate and machinery details
